headline: 1 Dividend Growth Stock Down 45% to Buy Right Now
summary: Stocks that are on sale are more commonly fallen angels, which are great companies that are facing some near-term hardship.  From an investment point of view, the goal is to buy the fallen angels that seem likely to earn their wings again.  If you are looking for a dividend growth stock the very first thing to consider here is Hormel's status as a Dividend King.
